definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: IV. [[כפר]] (√ of foll., = dig ? cf. Sab. [[כפר]], vb. dig, n. cave, DHM:Anzeiger d. Wiener Ak., phil.-hist. Cl., Dec. 17, 1884, quoted by Eut:Nab 27; Nö:ib. comp. also Eth. kafar: basket, measure; Nab. [[כפר]] cave, sepulcher, synon. of [[קברא]] Nö in Eut:Nab ib.)
